TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but world war III never happens

I wish I was me

Granted you implode.

I wish that World War III happens because North Korea took out the Mild-east.

Granted, but no one has seen the Mild Wild West

I wish for a Eagle LM

Granted i lands on you.

I wish to live in the game of Guns of Icarus.

Granted, but only in the LM decent module

I wish for you to pilot a train

Granted i hit you.

I wish me ,and General Rarity went to the world of Guns of Icarus.

Granted, but I dont go

I wish for a picture on my computer

Granted it is a "cupcake"

I wish to have a muffin.

Granted, but it turns into crumbs again since I ate it

I wish for a universe

Granted it were you die.

I wish i was a cyberpony.

Granted, but you are trapped inside of the internet because cyber doesn't have to mean cyborg.

I wish that I was the host of the new hit show North Korea's Got Talent.

Granted but your move is watched by the watchers.

I wish that North Korea's government fell.(no offense North Korea)

Granted, but they fell all the way down to South Korea and they started their new regime there.

I wish for a immovable object.

Granted, but it's attached to you.

I wish for a book.

I wish for a book.

Granted, it's telephone book.

I wish for [censored (lets keep it PG13)].

Granted. You now have the ability to [REDACTED] the [REDACTED] [DATA EXPUNGED] from [REDACTED] and to [EXPUNGED] [REDACTED] at [REDACTED] [DATA EXPUNGED]. You can now also [CENSORED] [bLOCKED] with [DATA EXPUNGED] success rate to [DATA EXPUNGED]. Unfortunately, this will make you [CENSORED], [CENSORED], [REDACTED], and [DATA EXPUNGED] because you are now a [REDACTED] with [DATA EXPUNGED] individual, and some people will find you [CENSORED] because of [DATA EXPUNGED], [CENSORED], [CENSORED], and other things that will [DATA EXPUNGED]. Too bad.

I wish for cool.

Granted. Unfortunately you freeze.

I wish to be a panda.

I wish to be a panda.

Granted. But you are kept in poorly maintained zoo, where kids throw things at you.

I wish for Totoro to be my neighbor.

Granted, but as he's an anime character and made of paper he crumples into a soggy mess in the rain.

I wish I could stop time

Granted, but the influence of wibbly wobbly, timey wimey... stuff... causes time to be stopped forever.

I wish that I didn't have to wake up so early.

branted but now you can't go to bed till 5 in the morning and get up at 9 in the morning

I wish for first contact with a peaceful race of aliens and with a cure for all their illnesses so the cure and illness is safe for humans.

Granted ,but there is still an infinite amount of sickness ,and illness.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, but it tastes like a cupcake.

I wish for a MiG.

Granted ,but it is a model.

I wish for a muffin.

granted but Derpy ate it

I wish I was a companion of the doctor
